(I'm back. I hadn't read all the posts though.)

Quickstrike:




With Rattrap under his foot, struggling to fight back, weapons 
missing, Quickstrike turned his head and shoulder towards Tarantulas. 
He looked back down on Rattrap. "Fine," he said.

He kicked him, then walked past the spider, into the corridor. He 
walked down to Black Arachnia's location. He had to pause of few 
times to make sure not to get lost. This ship was much more bigger 
than Megatron's old ship.

He stepped up, a few dents on his chest and shoulders from Rattrap.

"Yeah, sugar-bot? Ya wanna hear 'bout th' vermin?"
